blogPost.excerpt:
WANDAVISION Episode 5 Breakdown & Ending Explained Spoiler Review | Marvel Easter Eggs & Theories. We review, recap and explain the fifth episode of Wandavision on Disney Plus. This contains easter eggs, theories, spoilers and a breakdown of the events and behind the scenes leaks on the Marvel property. We also discuss where the Evan Peter's Quicksilver role could be going so make sure you stay until the end.

#Wandavision #EasterEggs #EndingExplained #Quicksilver #EvanPeters #Marvel #MCU #Wanda #Vision #Episode5 #Episode6 #CaptainAmerica #IronMan #Disney #Pietro #Ultron #Darcy

If you enjoyed this video then please subscribe to the channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ?sub_confirmation=1

If You Want To Help Support The Channel So I Can Make More Videos Like This Please Donate Here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ/join

Get some awesome Heavy Spoilers show clothes, phonecases and accessories at - https://teespring.com/en-GB/stores/deffinitions-store

Shoutouts to BYND EPIC at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8IFtZohOYLRWX6uCI5w89g

*Check out our BEST new videos below*
*Fight Club Easter Eggs* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LmMQzjJ8a5g&feature=youtu.be
*Wandavision Episode 4 Breakdown* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qz1f3FQ-9Kg
*The Dark Knight Easter Eggs* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-K_bmCxUWCY&feature=youtu.be
*Godzilla Vs Kong Trailer Breakdown* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oftPMViKDSU&feature=youtu.be
*Suicide Squad Ayer Cut Explained* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s6vcyrTtzE0&feature=youtu.be


/* ----- SOCIAL MEDIA ----- */

Follow Me On Social Media At:
https://www.facebook.com/DeffinitionMC/
https://twitter.com/heavyspoilers
https://www.instagram.com/heavyspoilers/


/* ----- DISCORD ----- */

Join our Discord Community at - https://discord.gg/dDMJN4a


/* ----- VIDEO INFORMATION ----- */

Shoutouts man like Velk

Wandavision is a Disney Plus MCU Marvel Show by Kevin Feige starring Elizabeth Olsen and Paul Bettany. The Show is rumored to feature Mephisto, Agatha Harkness, The Grim Reaper and more. Every week we will be doing Wandavision breakdowns, easter egg videos, theories and ending explaineds so definitely stick around. We will also be discussing upcoming Marvel Phase 4 properties such as Spider-man 3, Loki, Falcon and The Winter Soldier, The Eternals and Black Widow.

0:00 Episode 5 Intro
0:34 Avengers Endgame Post Credits Scene
1:22 Vision And The Scarlett Witch Graphic Novel
2:04 Agnes Theories And Clues
3:34 Episode 5 Sitcom Influences
5:03 Wandavision Episode 5 Breakdown
18:04 Wandavision Episode 6 Spoilers And Leaks

Ok so Episode 4 ended with us finding out that Scarlett Witch was doing a weekend at Wanda's with Visions dead corpse. It was a mindblowing moment that set her up as the big bad but throughout the season there's been several clues that something more sinister is going on behind the scenes.

We're gonna be breaking it all down but as always Welcome to the Heavy Spoilers show I'm your host Paul aka the guy who Jimmy Woos you with my card tricks now let's get into the biggidy biggidy breakdown.

Now as always things are time coded below if you wanna skip ahead but as is usual with our breakdowns we're gonna be discussing some key theories up top.

If you've been keeping up to date with the behind the scenes stuff on the show then you'll know that the showrunner Jac Schaeffer revealed that Wandavision actually takes place almost immediately after Endgame and before the events of Far From Home.

If you checked out our video last week then you'll has seen us discussing an interview with Paul Bettany in which he revealed that Endgame originally had a post credits scene that set up the events of the show. It was supposed to close out with Wanda going to see Vision's body which was being kept in a drawer and we can see why this was cut as it happens at one point in the episode.

Vision actually didn't want to be brought back to life but Wanda doing this shows that she has completely broken his trust.

► Artist Attribution
Music By: "KaizanBlu"
• Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/kaizanblu/
• SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/kaizanblu/

• TikTok - @kaizanblu http://vm.tiktok.com/aCYwfx/

localize.title: WANDAVISION第5集剧情分析及结局解释 漫威复活节彩蛋及理论｜漫威复活节彩蛋及理论
localize.description:
WANDAVISION第5集剧情分解与结局解说Spoiler Review｜漫威复活节彩蛋与理论。我们回顾，回顾和解释第五集的Wandavision在Disney Plus上。这包含了复活节彩蛋，理论，破坏者和事件的分解和幕后泄漏的Marvel财产。我们还讨论了埃文-彼得的Quicksilver角色可能会去哪里，所以请确保你留到最后。

#Wandavision #EasterEggs #EndingExplained #Quicksilver #EvanPeters #Marvel #MCU #Wanda #Vision #Episode5 #Episode6 #CaptainAmerica #IronMan #Disney #Pietro #Ultron #Darcy#。

如果你喜欢这个视频，那么请订阅这个频道https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ?sub_confirmation=1。

如果你想帮助支持我的频道，让我能制作更多这样的视频，请在这里捐款。
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ/join

获取一些令人敬畏的重度破坏者展会的衣服，手机壳和配件，在-https://teespring.com/en-GB/stores/deffinitions-store。

喊话BYND EPIC：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8IFtZohOYLRWX6uCI5w89g。

*以下是我们最好的新视频*。
*格斗俱乐部复活节彩蛋* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LmMQzjJ8a5g&feature=youtu.be
*万达威视第4集分解* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qz1f3FQ-9Kg
*黑暗骑士复活节彩蛋* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-K_bmCxUWCY&feature=youtu.be
*哥斯拉大战金刚》预告片解析* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oftPMViKDSU&feature=youtu.be
*自杀小队》艾尔剪辑解读* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s6vcyrTtzE0&feature=youtu.be


----- SOCIAL MEDIA ----- *//

在社交媒体上关注我。
https://www.facebook.com/DeffinitionMC/
https://twitter.com/heavyspoilers
https://www.instagram.com/heavyspoilers/


----- DISCORD ----- */

加入我们的Discord社区：https://discord.gg/dDMJN4a


----- 视频信息 ----- */

像Velk这样的大喊大叫的人

Wandavision是由凯文-费奇主演的迪士尼加MCU漫威剧，由伊丽莎白-奥尔森和保罗-贝坦尼主演。据传该剧将有墨菲斯托、阿加莎-哈克尼斯、死神等人出演。每周我们都会做Wandavision的分解、复活节彩蛋视频、理论和结局解释，所以一定要坚持下去。我们还将讨论即将到来的漫威第四阶段的属性，如蜘蛛侠3，洛基，猎鹰和冬兵，永恒者和黑寡妇。

0:00 第5集 介绍
0:34 复仇者联盟终结战后字幕场景
1:22 视觉与斯嘉丽女巫图文小说
2:04 艾格尼丝理论和线索
3:34第5集情景喜剧的影响
5:03万达威视第5集剧情分析
18:04万达威视第6集剧透和泄露的消息

好吧，第四集的结局是我们发现斯嘉丽女巫和维斯的死尸在万达家过周末。这是一个令人震惊的时刻，她被设定为大坏蛋，但在整个赛季中，已经有一些线索表明，在幕后有更邪恶的事情发生。

我们将对这一切进行分析，但和以往一样，欢迎来到 "重磅炸弹 "节目，我是你们的主持人保罗，也就是那个用我的纸牌技巧骗你的吉米，现在让我们进入大块头大块头的分析。

如果你想跳过的话，下面的内容已经有了时间编码，但是和我们的分析一样，我们会在上面讨论一些关键的理论。

如果你一直在关注该剧的幕后花絮，那么你就会知道，该剧的编剧Jac Schaeffer透露，Wandavision实际上几乎是紧接着Endgame之后，在Far From Home的事件之前发生的。

如果你看过我们上周的视频，那么你就会看到我们在讨论对Paul Bettany的采访，他在采访中透露Endgame原本有一个片尾的场景，设置了剧中的事件。本来结尾的时候旺达要去看Vision的尸体，而Vision的尸体被放在抽屉里，我们可以看到为什么会被剪掉，因为在剧情中曾经发生过这样的事情。

Vision其实并不想被复活，但Wanda这样做说明她已经完全打破了他的信任。

►艺人归属
音乐作者： "KaizanBlu"
- Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/kaizanblu/
- SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/kaizanblu/
- Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/kaizanblumusic/
- TikTok - @kaizanblu http://vm.tiktok.com/aCYwfx/
- YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUtx...
- 下载 @ https://www.chilloutmedia.com/kaizanblu
许可证。知识共享署名-相同方式共享4.0国际 (CC BY-SA 4.0)
- 完整许可: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/...
- 音乐发布者：Chill Out Records @ https: Chill Out Records Chill Out Records @ https://goo.gl/fh3rEJ & https://www.LoFi-HipHop.com

► 艺术家署名
Lofi Geek @Spotify: https://spoti.fi/3g16Pgr
洛非极客官方频道：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyD59CI7beJDU493glZpxgA

localize.title: WANDAVISION第5集劇情分析及結局解釋 漫威復活節彩蛋及理論｜漫威復活節彩蛋及理論
localize.description:
WANDAVISION第5集劇情分解與結局解說Spoiler Review｜漫威復活節彩蛋與理論。我們回顧，回顧和解釋第五集的Wandavision在Disney Plus上。這包含了復活節彩蛋，理論，破壞者和事件的分解和幕後泄漏的Marvel財產。我們還討論了埃文-彼得的Quicksilver角色可能會去哪裏，所以請確保你留到最後。

#Wandavision #EasterEggs #EndingExplained #Quicksilver #EvanPeters #Marvel #MCU #Wanda #Vision #Episode5 #Episode6 #CaptainAmerica #IronMan #Disney #Pietro #Ultron #Darcy#。

如果你喜歡這個視頻，那麼請訂閱這個頻道https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ?sub_confirmation=1。

如果你想幫助支持我的頻道，讓我能製作更多這樣的視頻，請在這裏捐款。

喊話BYND EPIC：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8IFtZohOYLRWX6uCI5w89g。

*以下是我們最好的新視頻*。
*格鬥俱樂部復活節彩蛋* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LmMQzjJ8a5g&feature=youtu.be
*萬達威視第4集分解* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qz1f3FQ-9Kg
*黑暗騎士復活節彩蛋* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-K_bmCxUWCY&feature=youtu.be
*哥斯拉大戰金剛》預告片解析* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oftPMViKDSU&feature=youtu.be

https://twitter.com/heavyspoilers
https://www.instagram.com/heavyspoilers/


----- DISCORD ----- */

加入我們的Discord社區：https://discord.gg/dDMJN4a


----- 視頻信息 ----- */

像Velk這樣的大喊大叫的人

Wandavision是由凱文-費奇主演的迪士尼加MCU漫威劇，由伊麗莎白-奧爾森和保羅-貝坦尼主演。據傳該劇將有墨菲斯托、阿加莎-哈克尼斯、死神等人出演。每週我們都會做Wandavision的分解、復活節彩蛋視頻、理論和結局解釋，所以一定要堅持下去。我們還將討論即將到來的漫威第四階段的屬性，如蜘蛛俠3，洛基，獵鷹和冬兵，永恆者和黑寡婦。

0:00 第5集 介紹
0:34 復仇者聯盟終結戰後字幕場景
1:22 視覺與斯嘉麗女巫圖文小說
2:04 艾格尼絲理論和線索
3:34第5集情景喜劇的影響
5:03萬達威視第5集劇情分析
18:04萬達威視第6集劇透和泄露的消息

好吧，第四集的結局是我們發現斯嘉麗女巫和維斯的死屍在萬達家過週末。這是一個令人震驚的時刻，她被設定爲大壞蛋，但在整個賽季中，已經有一些線索表明，在幕後有更邪惡的事情發生。

我們將對這一切進行分析，但和以往一樣，歡迎來到 "重磅炸彈 "節目，我是你們的主持人保羅，也就是那個用我的紙牌技巧騙你的吉米，現在讓我們進入大塊頭大塊頭的分析。

如果你想跳過的話，下面的內容已經有了時間編碼，但是和我們的分析一樣，我們會在上面討論一些關鍵的理論。

如果你一直在關注該劇的幕後花絮，那麼你就會知道，該劇的編劇Jac Schaeffer透露，Wandavision實際上幾乎是緊接着Endgame之後，在Far From Home的事件之前發生的。

如果你看過我們上週的視頻，那麼你就會看到我們在討論對Paul Bettany的採訪，他在採訪中透露Endgame原本有一個片尾的場景，設置了劇中的事件。本來結尾的時候旺達要去看Vision的屍體，而Vision的屍體被放在抽屜裏，我們可以看到爲什麼會被剪掉，因爲在劇情中曾經發生過這樣的事情。

Vision其實並不想被複活，但Wanda這樣做說明她已經完全打破了他的信任。

previous.excerpt:
Listen to ‘drivers license’ out now: https://smarturl.it/driverslicense

Follow Olivia Rodrigo:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/olivia.rodrigo
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Olivia_Rodrigo  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OliviaRodrigoOfficial
YouTube: https://youtube.com/oliviarodrigomusic  
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@livbedumb  
Store: https://smarturl.it/oliviarodrigosho

Lyrics:

I got my drivers license last week
Just like we always talked about
‘Cause you were so excited for me
To finally drive up to your house
But today I drove through the suburbs
Crying 'cause you weren’t around

And you’re probably with that blonde girl
Who always made me doubt
She’s so much older than me
She’s everything I’m insecure about
Yeah today I drove through the suburbs
‘Cause how could I ever love someone else

And I know we weren’t perfect but I’ve never felt this way for no one
And I just can’t imagine how you could be so okay now that I’m gone
Guess you didn’t mean what you wrote in that song about me
‘Cause you said forever now I drive alone past your street

And all my friends are tired
Of hearing how much I miss you but
I kinda feel sorry for them
‘Cause they’ll never know you the way that I do
Yeah today I drove through the suburbs
And pictured I was driving home to you

And I know we weren’t perfect but I’ve never felt this way for no one
And I just can’t imagine how you could be so okay now that I’m gone
I guess you didn’t mean what you wrote in that song about me
‘Cause you said forever now I drive alone past your street
 
Red Lights
Stop signs
I still see your face
In the white cars
Front yards
Cant drive past the places
We used to
Go to
‘Cause I still love you babe
 
Sidewalks
We crossed
I still hear your voice
In the traffic
We’re laughing
Over all the noise
God I’m so blue
Know were through
But I still love you babe
 
I know we weren’t perfect but I’ve never felt this way for no one
And I just can’t imagine how you could be so okay now that I’m gone
guess you didn’t mean what you wrote in that song about me
'cause you said forever now I drive alone past your street
Yeah you said forever now I drive alone past your street

localize.title: 奥利维亚-罗德里戈--驾照(Live From The Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon/2021)
localize.description:
听 "驾驶执照 "现在出来：https://smarturl.it/driverslicense。

关注Olivia Rodrigo。
Instagram: https://instagram.com/olivia.rodrigo
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Olivia_Rodrigo  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OliviaRodrigoOfficial
YouTube: https://youtube.com/oliviarodrigomusic  
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@livbedumb  
商店：https://smarturl.it/oliviarodrigosho

歌词：

我上周拿到了驾照
就像我们常说的
"因为你为我如此兴奋
终于开到你家了
但今天我开车经过郊区的时候
因为你不在身边而哭泣

而你可能和那个金发女孩在一起。
谁总是让我怀疑
她比我大很多
她是我的一切不安全感
是啊，今天我开车经过郊区时...
"因为我怎么可能爱别人

我知道我们并不完美，但我从未对任何人有这种感觉。
我只是无法想象你怎么能这么好，现在我走了。
我猜你在那首歌里写的不是我的意思
"因为你说过永远" "现在我独自开车经过你的街道

而我所有的朋友都累了
听到我有多想你，但
我觉得有点对不起他们
因为他们永远不会像我一样了解你。
是啊，今天我开车经过郊区时...
而照片中的我正开车回家找你

我知道我们并不完美，但我从未对任何人有这种感觉。
我只是无法想象你怎么能这么好，现在我走了。
我想你在那首歌里写的关于我的内容，并不是那个意思
"因为你说过永远" "现在我独自开车经过你的街道
 
红灯
停止标志
我还能看到你的脸
在白色汽车里
前院
不能开车过去的地方
我们以前
前往
因为我仍然爱你，宝贝
 
人行道
我们过了
我还能听到你的声音
在交通方面
我们在笑
在所有的噪音
天啊，我好蓝
知道是通过
但我仍然爱你，宝贝
 
我知道我们并不完美 但我从来没有对任何人有这种感觉。
我只是无法想象你怎么能这么好，现在我走了。
我想你在那首歌里写的关于我的内容并不是真心的
"因为你说过要永远这样" "现在我独自开车经过你的街道
是啊，你说过永远，现在我一个人开车经过你的街道。

http://vevo.ly/Att41J

因爲你不在身邊而哭泣

我知道我們並不完美，但我從未對任何人有這種感覺。
